data.text: Bildad tangada Shuah ga helekai,
“Job, tagadilinga dangada be goe deenaa e deemee di noho deemuu?
Goe e hagamaanadu bolo gimaadou e boiboi gadoo be nia kau?
Goe e bida haga mmae hua goe gi do hagawelewele.
Di maalama o tangada huaidu gaa huli ga bouli dongoeho.
Di maalama dela i lodo dono hale le e bouli.
I mua digaula nogo tuu mau dangihi,
Digaula e taele laa lodo di gubenge, gei nadau wae guu llawe.
Di hele guu hele nadau babaawae, gu daahi digaula.
Di hele guu danu i lodo di gelegele,
“Di madagu e noho i nadau baahi e talitali.
Nogo maluagina huoloo i mua, gei dolomeenei gei digaula gu hiigai wawe.
Di magi huaidu huoloo guu gahu nadau gili,
Digaula gu laha mai gi daha mo nadau hale ala nogo noho ai i di aumaalia,
Dolomeenei guu mee hua di noho di ingoo hua tangada
Nia aga mo nia manga digaula la guu mae gu maangoo.
Nadau longo gu haga odi hua i lodo nadau guongo
Digaula ga hagabagi gi daha mo tenua o digau ala e mouli,
Gu deai nadau madawaawa ai, gei deai tangada ne dubu i nadau guongo ai.
Daamada i dua gaa hana gaa tugi i dai,
Deenei di hai o di hagaduadua o digau huaidu,
